title: Which Cigars Should a Retailer Drop Before a Trade Show? - The After Show
itunes:title: Which Cigars Should a Retailer Drop Before a Trade Show? - The After Show
description:
What dilemmas do retailers face when deciding which lines to drop? Is it as easy as just getting rid of the slow movers?........the answer may surprise you.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
